title: Match of the Day 2: Pochettino brings 'full throttle' football to Chelsea
description: Match of the Day 2's Shay Given praises Chelsea's new "full throttle" style of play under Mauricio Pochettino following their 1-1 draw with Liverpool.

title: Zuckerberg says Musk 'not serious' about cage fight
description: Doubt hangs over the billionaires' fight plans, but Musk suggests he is open to a bout on Monday.

title: Moises Caicedo: Why Chelsea and Liverpool both wanted Brighton midfielder
description: MOTD2 pundit Danny Murphy says Chelsea's draw with Liverpool shows why both wanted Brighton's Moises Caicedo - before the Blues got their man.

title: Moises Caicedo transfer news: Chelsea agree £115m deal for Brighton midfielder
description: Chelsea agreed a deal to sign Brighton midfielder Moises Caicedo for a British record £115m.

title: Harry Maguire: Erik ten Hag says defender must prove he is top class or leave Man Utd
description: Erik ten Hag says Harry Maguire would be better leaving Manchester United if he is not confident enough to battle for a first-team spot.

title: Cambodia: Thousands of war-era explosives found buried at high school
description: Thousands of unexploded munitions were discovered buried in the grounds of a high school.

title: The Hundred 2023: Tom Banton's brilliant stumping leads plays of the day
description: Watch the best plays from Sunday's action in The Hundred, featuring Tom Banton, Harry Brook and Sophie Ecclestone.

title: The Hundred 2023: Jamie Smith helps Birmingham Phoenix beat Oval Invincibles for first win
description: Jamie Smith's maiden fifty in The Hundred helps Birmingham Phoenix to a 41-run victory over Oval Invincibles - their first win of the 2023 season.

title: 'Impediment or opportunity' - can Spurs find a new 'superstar'?
description: BBC Sport looks at the beginning of the Ange Postecoglou era amid the backdrop of Harry Kane's exit at Tottenham.

title: Women's Open: Protestors with flares halt play after making way on to 17th green
description: Play is halted briefly at the Women's Open in Surrey after protesters with flares make their way on to the 17th green.

title: Chelsea 1-1 Liverpool: Axel Disasi scores on his debut to secure point for Chelsea
description: Chelsea and Liverpool play out a thrilling draw as both sides illustrate why they are doing battle over £110m Brighton midfielder Moises Caicedo.

title: Women's Open: Lilia Vu wins at Walton Heath for second major title of 2023
description: Lilia Vu produces a composed display to win the Women's Open at Walton Heath, the American's second major title of 2023.

title: Police search for teenage hillwalker missing in Highlands
description: The police, coastguard, and mountain rescue teams have been searching for missing Isaac Johnson.

title: PSNI data breach: Civilian worker 'no longer feels safe in home'
description: The man's name was on a document mistakenly shared by the PSNI that gave details of about 10,000 employees.

title: The Hundred 2023: Jamie Overton powers Manchester Originals to win over Northern Superchargers
description: Jamie Overton smashes a sensational unbeaten 83 off 30 balls as Manchester Originals beat Northern Superchargers by 40 runs in The Hundred.

title: Pembrokeshire campsite owner on moment car rolled onto tents
description: A cot protected a baby from injuries after a car crashed into its tent, says the campsite's owner.

title: New Zealand's youth vaping crisis clouds smoke-free future
description: As cigarettes are phased out, parents say new laws do little to address rampant vaping by young people.

title: Hawaii wildfires: Volunteers bring aid by boat to devastated Maui
description: Volunteers formed a human chain to pass aid off the boat as quickly as possible.

title: Brentford 2-2 Tottenham Hotspur: Emerson Royal earns Spurs point

title: Omagh bomb service 'testament to community spirit' 25 years on
description: Twenty-nine people died in August 1998 in the single biggest atrocity of the Northern Ireland Troubles.

title: University marking boycott: Robert Halfon calls for talks to end dispute
description: Robert Halfon calls for new talks to stop the boycott continuing into the new academic year.

title: Ukraine war: Three-week-old baby and family among seven killed in Russian shelling
description: Russian shelling in Ukraine's southern Kherson region leaves seven civilians dead.

title: Harry Kane: Bayern Munich striker did not want to end career with regrets
description: New £86m signing Harry Kane says "I've got plenty of football left in my career" after making his Bayern Munich debut.

title: Beauty spot selfies 'adding to mountain pressures'
description: Beauty spot selfie photos prompt others into the mountains, says park official, amid rise in rescues.

title: World Cycling Championships 2023: GB's Beth Shriever wins BMX Supercross gold
description: Watch as Great Britain's Beth Shriever wins the women's BMX Racing Supercross title at the 2023 Cycling World Championships in Scotland.

title: Karen Bardsley: The key battles that could decide Australia v England
description: In Karen Bardsley's latest column, the former goalkeeper discusses the key battles between semi-finalists England and Australia before Wednesday's showdown.

title: Aberdeen 1-3 Celtic: Champions overcome spirited hosts for second straight win
description: Champions Celtic hold off a spirited Aberdeen to make it two wins out of two in the Scottish Premiership.

title: Roberto Mancini resigns as Italy boss after five-year reign
description: Roberto Mancini has resigned as the manager of Italy after five years in charge.

title: Miss Universe Organisation cuts Indonesia ties over sex abuse claims
description: Contestants complained they were unexpectedly asked to strip for body checks for scars and cellulite.

title: Iran's politicians to debate hijab laws in secret
description: The new bill imposes strict punishments on women who fail to wear a headscarf in Iran.

title: Pub takeaway drinks rules to be continued
description: Landlords in England and Wales will be able to continue selling takeaway drinks through hatches under Covid-era rules.

description: Reaching semi-finals of major tournaments is what England 'are known for', says defender Lucy Bronze.

title: Campsite car crash: Six in hospital after Pembrokeshire collision
description: One person airlifted to hospital, another five taken by road, and cordon is around collapsed tent.

description: British heptathlete Katarina Johnson-Thompson on targeting success in Budapest after a difficult four years since becoming world champion.

title: Raphael Rowe: 'You can't repair the damage if you're falsely accused'
description: Raphael Rowe was convicted of a brutal murder in 1990 but was released 12 years into a life sentence.

description: Everton condemn the social media abuse suffered by striker Neal Maupay following Saturday's Premier League defeat by Fulham at Goodison Park.

title: Suspected package thief pulled from drain after drone finds hiding spot

title: Mortgage rates are falling - but don't celebrate yet
